nodes.text: Teg Kithri was a settlement that was located on the Outer Rim planet Budpock. During the reign of the New Republic, the Rodian Threnda operated a cantina in the settlement, and in 19 ABY, the Jedi archivist and the spacers Reen Irana and Eddey Be'ray journeyed to Teg Kithri to destroy Threnda's supplies of the spice Tempest.
